emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group of young men and young women, including three young women wearing plaid skirts, dancing in Herron Hill Junior High School
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 27, 1954, pg. 21 reads: "Herron Hill P-TA Rallies to Keep Teen Canteen - Dancing - Most popular spot in building is the cafeteria which is converted to a dance pavilion. Plenty of lights and supervision, but the youngsters enjoy it."
